description.en: UltraNote Infinity is a Privacy Blockchain which powers UltraNote Project. UltraNote is Designed to be the ultimate privacy blockchain solution for untraceable & anonymous Payments, Private Blockchain Emails, Blockchain Banking and Privacy Encrypted Browsing on Tor Network. As a privacy blockchain everything that happens on UltraNote Infinity Network is blockchain encrypted and protected from  3rd parties. UltraNote Infinity has a Limited Maximum Coin Supply of 21 Million Coins expected to be distributed over the next 7 to 8 years.
